description: Adds some useful functions to your buildings.
name: Extended building view

buildingsLeftRight.description: Shows in the buildings how many of the same type still exist in the respective direction.
buildingsLeftRight.title: Number of buildings of the same type

enhanceVehicleList.description: Extends the vehicle list with useful features - some of which are specially adjustable.
enhanceVehicleList.title: Extend vehicle list

enhancedPersonnelAssignment.description: Gives you the opportunity to hide personnel without the appropriate training.
enhancedPersonnelAssignment.title: improved staff allocation

expansions.title: Show expansions directly
expansions.description: Shows the extensions of a building without having to press the extensions tab first.

fastDispatchChooser.title: Quick selection of the control center
fastDispatchChooser.description: Lets you select directly in a building to which control center it is assigned without having to access the settings first.

fmsSwitch.description: Allows you to switch between status 2 and 6 by clicking on the status.
fmsSwitch.title: Fast FMS change

personnelAssignmentBtn.description: Inserts next to the "Edit" button to add a button to the personnel assignment. - Does not yet work in control centers!
personnelAssignmentBtn.title: Button for personnel assignment

personnelDemands.description: Shows how much personnel is required with minimum and maximum vehicle occupancy.
personnelDemands.title: Personnel requirements

schoolingSummary.description: Shows in the staff overview of a building how many people have which training(s).
schoolingSummary.title: Personnel summary

vehicleTypes.description: Shows the vehicle type (and if available the own vehicle class) in a separate column
vehicleTypes.title: Vehicle type

vehiclesPersonnelMax.title: Maximum crew
vehiclesPersonnelMax.description: Shows the maximum number of people that can fit on the vehicle.

vehiclesPersonnelCurrent.title: Current Crew
vehiclesPersonnelCurrent.description: Shows how many people are currently sitting in the vehicle.

vehiclesPersonnelAssigned.title: Assigned crew
vehiclesPersonnelAssigned.description: Shows how many people are assigned to the vehicle.

vehiclesPersonnelColorized.title: Color code for assigned crew
vehiclesPersonnelColorized.description: Highlights the number of assigned crew in red if it is less than the maximum possible, green when the maximum number is reached.
